webgames.title: Web Games
webgames.description: Here you’ll find some small web games I created as a test with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Have fun playing!

apps.title: App Development
apps.description: I was always annoyed having 20 apps for every single function on my phone. So I decided to create my own app where all functions are bundled in one place. That’s how Chorez was born.

games.title: Game Development
games.description: For years I’ve wanted to develop my own games and the ideas in my head are overflowing. Here you can learn all about my dev journey and my current game projects.

webGames.title: Web Games
webGames.description: Here you can find some small web games I created as a test using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Have fun playing!

appDevelopment.title: App Development
appDevelopment.description: It always bothered me to have 20 apps for every single function on my phone. So I decided to create my own app, combining all functions in one place. Chorez was born.

chorez.title: Chorez App
chorez.description: An app that bundles various everyday functions and helps you bring clarity and simplicity to your daily life.

gameDev.title: Game Development
gameDev.description: For years, I wanted to develop my own games, and ideas constantly overflow in my mind. Here you can learn everything about my dev journey and current game projects.

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.answer1: This website is operated exclusively by PlaywithK. For further questions, check the 'Web Development' tab.
FAQ.question2: What is the purpose of the website?
FAQ.answer2: PlaywithK.de is designed to inform about projects by and with PlaywithK, and to explore and discover new things!
FAQ.question3: Is this website private or commercial?
FAQ.answer3: The website is used solely for private purposes and has no commercial benefit.
FAQ.question4: May I reuse content from the website?
FAQ.answer4: All content from PlaywithK.de may be freely used with a link back to the website.
FAQ.question5: How often is the content updated?
FAQ.answer5: The information on the website may be outdated as it is created in my free time. The exact last edit date can be seen at the bottom of each page.
